summary: *Ranma ½* is a popular Japanese manga and anime series created by Rumiko Takahashi. It tells the story of Ranma Saotome, a young martial artist who turns into a girl when splashed with cold water and back into a boy with hot water. The series is full of comedy and adventure as Ranma tries to break his curse while dealing with friends, enemies, and even fiancées. With its unique plot and memorable characters, *Ranma ½* has become a classic, with over 55 million manga copies sold worldwide.
title: Ranma ½
